verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai <WH5514>, in the first <WH7223> month <WH2320> of the second <WH8145> year <WH8141> after they were come out <WH3318> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, saying <WH559>,
Let the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> also keep <WH6213> the passover <WH6453> at his appointed season <WH4150>.

In the fourteenth <WH702> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of this month <WH2320>, at even <WH6153>, ye shall keep <WH6213> it in his appointed season <WH4150>: according to all the rites <WH2708> of it, and according to all the ceremonies <WH4941> thereof, shall ye keep <WH6213> it.
And Moses <WH4872> spake <WH1696> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, that they should keep <WH6213> the passover <WH6453>.

And they kept <WH6213> the passover <WH6453> on the fourteenth <WH702> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of the first <WH7223> month <WH2320> at even <WH6153> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai <WH5514>: according to all that the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>, so did <WH6213> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.

¶ And there were certain men <WH582>, who were defiled <WH2931> by the dead body <WH5315> of a man <WH120>, that they could <WH3201> not keep <WH6213> the passover <WH6453> on that day <WH3117>: and they came <WH7126> before <WH6440> Moses <WH4872> and before <WH6440> Aaron <WH175> on that day <WH3117>:

And those <WH1992> men <WH582> said <WH559> unto him, We are defiled <WH2931> by the dead body <WH5315> of a man <WH120>: wherefore are we kept back <WH1639>, that we may not offer <WH7126> an offering <WH7133> of the LORD <WH3068> in his appointed season <WH4150> among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>?
And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto them, Stand still <WH5975>, and I will hear <WH8085> what the LORD <WH3068> will command <WH6680> concerning you.
¶ And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>, If any <WH376> man <WH376> of you or of your posterity <WH1755> shall be unclean <WH2931> by reason of a dead body <WH5315>, or be in a journey <WH1870> afar off <WH7350>, yet he shall keep <WH6213> the passover <WH6453> unto the LORD <WH3068>.

The fourteenth <WH702> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of the second <WH8145> month <WH2320> at even <WH6153> they shall keep <WH6213> it, and eat <WH398> it with unleavened bread <WH4682> and bitter <WH4844> herbs.

They shall leave <WH7604> none of it unto the morning <WH1242>, nor break <WH7665> any bone <WH6106> of it: according to all the ordinances <WH2708> of the passover <WH6453> they shall keep <WH6213> it.

But the man <WH376> that is clean <WH2889>, and is not in a journey <WH1870>, and forbeareth <WH2308> to keep <WH6213> the passover <WH6453>, even the same soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> from among his people <WH5971>: because he brought <WH7126> not the offering <WH7133> of the LORD <WH3068> in his appointed season <WH4150>, that man <WH376> shall bear <WH5375> his sin <WH2399>.

And if a stranger <WH1616> shall sojourn <WH1481> among you, and will keep <WH6213> the passover <WH6453> unto the LORD <WH3068>; according to the ordinance <WH2708> of the passover <WH6453>, and according to the manner <WH4941> thereof, so shall he do <WH6213>: ye shall have one <WH259> ordinance <WH2708>, both for the stranger <WH1616>, and for him that was born <WH249> in the land <WH776>.

¶ And on the day <WH3117> that the tabernacle <WH4908> was reared up <WH6965> the cloud <WH6051> covered <WH3680> the tabernacle <WH4908>, namely, the tent <WH168> of the testimony <WH5715>: and at even <WH6153> there was upon the tabernacle <WH4908> as it were the appearance <WH4758> of fire <WH784>, until the morning <WH1242>.
So it was alway <WH8548>: the cloud <WH6051> covered <WH3680> it by day, and the appearance <WH4758> of fire <WH784> by night <WH3915>.

And when <WH6310> the cloud <WH6051> was taken up <WH5927> from the tabernacle <WH168>, then after <WH310> that the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> journeyed <WH5265>: and in the place <WH4725> where the cloud <WH6051> abode <WH7931>, there the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> pitched their tents <WH2583>.

At the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> journeyed <WH5265>, and at the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> they pitched <WH2583>: as long as <WH3117> the cloud <WH6051> abode <WH7931> upon the tabernacle <WH4908> they rested <WH2583> in their tents.

And when the cloud <WH6051> tarried long <WH748> upon the tabernacle <WH4908> many <WH7227> days <WH3117>, then the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> kept <WH8104> the charge <WH4931> of the LORD <WH3068>, and journeyed <WH5265> not.

And so it was <WH3426>, when the cloud <WH6051> was a few <WH4557> days <WH3117> upon the tabernacle <WH4908>; according to the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> they abode <WH2583> in their tents, and according to the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> they journeyed <WH5265>.

And so it was <WH3426>, when the cloud <WH6051> abode from even <WH6153> unto the morning <WH1242>, and that the cloud <WH6051> was taken up <WH5927> in the morning <WH1242>, then they journeyed <WH5265>: whether it was by day <WH3119> or by night <WH3915> that the cloud <WH6051> was taken up <WH5927>, they journeyed <WH5265>.

Or whether it were two days <WH3117>, or a month <WH2320>, or a year <WH3117>, that the cloud <WH6051> tarried <WH748> upon the tabernacle <WH4908>, remaining <WH7931> thereon, the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> abode <WH2583> in their tents, and journeyed <WH5265> not: but when it was taken up <WH5927>, they journeyed <WH5265>.

At the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> they rested <WH2583> in the tents, and at the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> they journeyed <WH5265>: they kept <WH8104> the charge <WH4931> of the LORD <WH3068>, at the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> by the hand <WH3027> of Moses <WH4872>.
